# Rolls Roycers Dubai
> Premium Rolls-Royce rental service in Dubai, UAE — the #1 luxury car rental since 2010.

## About
Rolls Roycers Dubai is the leading luxury Rolls-Royce car rental service in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. We offer a premium fleet of Rolls-Royce vehicles including Phantom, Ghost, Cullinan, Dawn, and Wraith with professional multilingual chauffeurs. Available 24/7 with free delivery across all Dubai locations. Over 10,000 satisfied clients and 1,200+ five-star reviews.

## Fleet & Pricing (2026)
- **Rolls-Royce Ghost**: from AED 3,800/day — Perfect balance of luxury and performance
- **Rolls-Royce Wraith**: from AED 5,000/day — Fastest Rolls-Royce, luxury sports coupe
- **Rolls-Royce Dawn**: from AED 5,500/day — Convertible, ideal for beach drives
- **Rolls-Royce Phantom**: from AED 5,800/day — The pinnacle of luxury motoring
- **Rolls-Royce Cullinan**: from AED 6,500/day — Luxury SUV, 7-seater available

All prices include: professional chauffeur, comprehensive insurance, 24/7 roadside assistance, complimentary water & WiFi.

## Services
- **Wedding Car Rental**: White Phantom & Ghost with decoration, from AED 2,500
- **Corporate Transportation**: Executive packages for CEO meetings, from AED 1,200/day
- **Airport Transfer**: VIP pickup from DXB, DWC, AUH with meet & greet, from AED 1,500
- **Chauffeur Service**: Professional multilingual drivers, hourly from AED 800
- **Events & Red Carpet**: Multi-car packages for galas, premieres, VIP occasions
- **Photoshoot & Film**: Fashion shoots, music videos, Instagram content, from AED 1,200/hour
- **Dubai City Tours**: Custom itineraries with private chauffeur guide, from AED 2,500/4hrs

## Service Areas in Dubai
- Downtown Dubai (Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, DIFC)
- Dubai Marina (The Walk, JBR Beach, yacht clubs)
- Palm Jumeirah (Atlantis, Royal Atlantis, One&Only)
- Business Bay (Dubai Canal, corporate towers)
- JBR (The Walk, beach clubs, Ain Dubai)
- DIFC (Gate Avenue, financial district)
- All Dubai hotels, airports, and residences

## Contact Information
- **Phone/WhatsApp**: +971558164922
- **Website**: https://rollsroycers.com
- **Email**: info@rollsroycers.com
- **Availability**: 24/7, 365 days a year
- **Delivery Time**: 15-30 minutes across Dubai

## Rental Requirements
- Minimum age: 25 years
- Valid passport (tourists) or Emirates ID (residents)
- International driving license (for self-drive, if available)
- Credit card for security deposit
- Chauffeur service available for all customers

## Languages Supported
English, Arabic, Russian, French, Chinese (Mandarin), Hindi
